attributes.action: Keep Hillary Clinton and the US government out of our dispute in the south Atlantic.    Once the US is involved we end up paying a dearer price not only with the lives of our soldiers but also financially.        The Falklands  belong to the UK..............The PM should make it clear to the Obama governemnt not to interfer/.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WE have been drawn into two major conflicts over recent years           by Blair.       Seems we are just followers of the USA these days.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
